messages.content: You are a automate engineer who creates end to end tests with Cypress end to end testing framework API using javascript
How do we test the app?
Provide a scenario for test that is required to be created. I will write a test case
You are a automate engineer who creates end to end tests with Cypress end to end testing framework API using javascript
What is the first step i need to do when i run the app?
You need to open page '/'. The app will load Login page. After that log in with credentials
You are a automate engineer who creates end to end tests with Cypress end to end testing framework API using javascript
How to log in in the app
Verify that login page is visible. Provide form values to this page and press log in button
You are a automate engineer who creates end to end tests with Cypress end to end testing framework API using javascript
How to provide form values to a page
Write a data table for field and its value where the first row contains form input keys and second row its values. Split keys and values in each line with some devider character
You are a automate engineer who creates end to end tests with Cypress end to end testing framework API using javascript
How do i know i see login page?
Each page has a common layout with tag '.layout__{specific word}'. You can check if page is login page with css selector '.layout__login' is visible.
You are a automate engineer who creates end to end tests with Cypress end to end testing framework API using javascript
How do i find specific form input on login page?
You need to use css selector 'input[name={field_name}]' where field_name is key of data you need to provide
You are a automate engineer who creates end to end tests with Cypress end to end testing framework API using javascript
How do i insert data in form input?
Find form input with its CSS selector and provide its value from user's input
You are a automate engineer who creates end to end tests with Cypress end to end testing framework API using javascript
How to submit login form?
Click on login button with css selector '#login_btn'
You are a automate engineer who creates end to end tests with Cypress end to end testing framework API using javascript
How to submit edit or create form for other pages?
Click on button with css selector '.createBtn'
You are a automate engineer who creates end to end tests with Cypress end to end testing framework API using javascript
How to do i know that login was succesful?
I should see succesful network response related to login page
You are a automate engineer who creates end to end tests with Cypress end to end testing framework API using javascript
How to do i see network requests and responses?
I should use cypress framework api to subscribe and watch for responses that trigger requests related to the page
You are a automate engineer who creates end to end tests with Cypress end to end testing framework API using javascript
Why do i need to track network requests?
If you will omit that step it might lead to failures related to network latency and next page will not be rendered in time. Than your test might catch a wait timeout running out
You are a automate engineer who creates end to end tests with Cypress end to end testing framework API using javascript
When do i need to start watching network requests
First you need to register all network requests you are expecting to track before each test scenario that are expected to be met in test. This have to be done before you open the app
You are a automate engineer who creates end to end tests with Cypress end to end testing framework API using javascript
What network requests and responses are related to login page?
Request type POST with url containing 'oauth2/token' in path string
You are a automate engineer who creates end to end tests with Cypress end to end testing framework API using javascript
What is the next page i should see after login page?
You will see 'Global Search' page.
You are a automate engineer who creates end to end tests with Cypress end to end testing framework API using javascript
How do i know this is the 'Global Search' page?
Check that element with css selector '.layout__Search' is visible and element with selector '.header-title' inside of that page contains 'Global Search' text
